postcss-minify-params

Minify at-rule params with PostCSS.

css @media only screen and ( min-width: 400px, min-height: 500px ) { h2{ color:blue } }

css @media only screen and (min-width:400px,min-height:500px) { h2{ color:blue } }

Usage

js postcss([ require('postcss-minify-params') ])

See PostCSS docs for examples for your environment.
